title: Daniel Craig confronted perv who pinched girlfriend's butt
text:
Jason Merritt/Getty Images Daniel Craig and Rachel Weisz married four years ago. Actor Daniel Craig has revealed how he once threatened a perv who pinched his girfriend’s butt.
Craig – who stars in upcoming James Bond flick ‘Spectre’ – said he flew into a jealous rage when he spotted a man getting over-familiar with a former girlfriend.
But the 47-year-old said that he’s nothing like the fictional British spy – because he avoids violence at all costs.
“I play a tough guy, but that’s not me. I’ve always been good at avoiding fights,” Craig told The Sun .
“But someone looking at my girl in the wrong way always got me going. I still get jealous, but not how I used to.
“I was in a bar in France once and this guy pinched my girl’s a--e and I flew across the room and kind of lifted the guy up.”
Mike Pont/FilmMagic Craig revealed he becomes fully immersed in his character while filming, which can lead to friction with his family. Craig, who married Rachel Weisz four years ago, said he’s now a much calmer man and added: “I’m in love, I’m happy. “
In an interview with British radio, the 007 actor also said that he becomes fully immersed in the character during filming, leading to friction with his family.
“I’m away from home for eight months. There’s no other way of doing it,” he added.
“My family hate me. They’re just starting to forgive me now.”
The film, the 24th in the Bond franchise, is set for a UK release this weekend, before bring released on Nov. 26 worldwide.
